problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AB=3,BC=4,BE平分∠ABC交AD于E,则AE和ED分别为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, BE bisects ∠ABC crosses AD to E, then AE and ED are respectively ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴BC=AD=4,AD∥BC,∴∠AEB=∠CBE,∵BE平分∠ABC,∴∠ABE=∠CBE,∴∠ABE=∠AEB,∴AB=AE=3,∴DE=4-3=1,故选:A．
